channel.title: Armadyl Sword
channel.description:
i saw someone make a armadyl longsword and that motivated me to make a shortsword.. so i did [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/zn4y82.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/1zzn8dl.jpg[/img] i couldnt decide to make the hilt blue or the colors of the armor set.. soo haha idk.. and wireframe [IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/2vljv4g.jpg[/img] haha like that guy on crack i drew XD haha i havent been posting much because i just got a new tablet and i've been drawing with that
oh yeah.. i made this reject shield thinking it would be cool for arma,, but it just turned out stupid :P [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/8x9e6w.jpg[/img]

item.title: Armadyl Sword
item.dc:creator: @Timberpig1 Timberpig.
item.description:
@Timberpig1 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:21, topic:359046”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=455538.msg3342575#msg3342575 date=1284510066]

He’s not that good lol

That was rude. For starting out, I would say that it’s a fairly decent model. Better the skillcapes, basic swords, or traced shit.

I was regarding i have an ax’s post gawd!! He said [QUOTE]you’re a really good 3d modeler[/QUOTE] I said not that good ffs, I have never had that said to me and ive made sht better than this

Well I pretty much only said that because I SUCK at 3d modeling (I can’t even make a SNOWMAN using a GUIDE), and I think they look really good.

Edit: h1 sk1ller, I heard from a lot of people that you leech models. IDK if this is true or not but if so, then yeah, I don’t know what kind of talent you actually have.

Axe I do not leech models in any way, me and krackkid had a fight and im sorry for the way I acted but next time guys don’t join into fights because it makes it worse… It was a fight between “us”, your probs all going to flame me again but idc…
[/quote]Make vid of you making a decent model.[/quote]
yes please ha

Read full topic
